## Scrollbar.resize() method

Recalculate the scrollbar's location and its length.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resize(opt_metrics?: Metrics): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_metrics | [Metrics](./blockly.utils_namespace.metrics_interface.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> A data structure of from the describing all the required dimensions. If not provided, it will be fetched from the host object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
